h2_title: Erlang, The Sacred Divinity Boss Fight and Guide
content: From this phase onward, you will have to deal with lighting from Erlang, so Shock-Quelling Powder and resistance to shock attacks are a huge help here.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Erlang,_The_Sacred_Divinity.md', within the main section titled 'Erlang, The Sacred Divinity', specifically from the subsection 'Erlang, The Sacred Divinity Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
From this phase onward, you will have to deal with lighting from Erlang, so Shock-Quelling Powder and resistance to shock attacks are a huge help here.
